name: JellyBelly's Wild Adventure
description:
Welcome to JellyBelly's Wild Adventure!

Can you make it to the final level? See if you can collect all the coins and defeat ALL the evil jellies! Each difficulty level gives you a different number of hits. On hard mode, one hit destroys you, so watch out!

Move and jump with WASD. Press backspace to restart the game.

Created by a student of the Game Generator class at Tulsa Community College.
